thread.title: Bath and Body Works released a massive Coco Shea collection that will give you angel-soft skin
thread.title_full: Bath and Body Works released a massive Coco Shea collection that will give you angel-soft skin

author: Bronwyn Isaac
title: Bath and Body Works released a massive Coco Shea collection that will give you angel-soft skin
text:
Bath and Body Works released a massive Coco Shea collection that will give you angel-soft skin The best way to ensure you‚Äôre treating your skin right is to pretend that it‚Äôs a precious little baby that needs constant lathering. Babies smell good and have soft gentle skin, and now you can too! How is this possible?! Well, Bath and Body Works dropped a Coco Shea collection full of soft moisturizers and heavenly scents.
For those of us who thought the release of Bath and Body Works whipped cream moisturizer marked the sexual and emotional peak of the brand, we have been gladly proven wrong by their foray into shea butter. The brand new line of body care products includes fragrant body oils, conditioning body butter , and creamy body wash.
They have three delicious flavors of body butter including: CocoSea Honey Body Butter (yes, please in our tea), CocoShea Coconut Body Butter (can‚Äôt go wrong with coconut), and the ultra refreshing Cocoshea Cucumber Aloe Gel Lotion.
You can bathe in any of these scrumptious body butters by purchasing them online for $16.50 .
Which moisturizer is your skin craving: the ultra-conditioning power of CocoShea Honey Body Butter, the rich nourishment of CocoShea Coconut Body Butter or a refreshing burst from CocoShea Cucumber Aloe Gel Lotion?! Tell us in the comments! #CocoShea 
A post shared by Bath & Body Works (@bathandbodyworks) on Mar 4, 2017 at 1:05pm PST 
Their creamy body wash is available in the same three sexy flavors as the butters so you can be forever soft. The body washes are sold individually for $13.50 on the website .
Our NEW #CocoShea Incredibly Creamy Body Wash is packed with ingredients like Cocoa Butter & rich Shea Butter to give your skin the much-needed moisture it's craving after just 1 shower! Ready to give it a try?! Get shopping NOW before they're gone! 
A post shared by Bath & Body Works (@bathandbodyworks) on Mar 5, 2017 at 6:01am PST 
It doesn‚Äôt stop there, they also have CocoShea body oil, shower gel, and a heavenly mist. These are available for you to fall in love with and purchase for $16.50 online .
O.M.NEW! Our newest CocoShea is going FAST! Get shopping ‚ôÄÔ∏èüõç so you can try NEW Shower Jelly, Lightweight Body Oil & Refreshing All-Over Mist before they're gone! #CocoShea 
A post shared by Bath & Body Works (@bathandbodyworks) on Mar 3, 2017 at 7:57am PST 
We can practically smell this line of products through the screen. Hey, we‚Äôre not complaining.
GIVEAWAY ALERT! We know you‚Äôre NUTS for NEW #CocoShea (seriously, it's almost sold out! ) so here‚Äôs your chance to win our entire CocoShea Coconut collection! Just LIKE this post by 11:59 PM ET TONIGHT for your chance to win it all! No purch. Nec. US res, age of maj. Void where prohibited. (Not void in New Jersey). Find full terms at the link in our bio or at bathandbodyworks.com/InstagramGiveaway 
A post shared by Bath & Body Works (@bathandbodyworks) on Mar 8, 2017 at 3:59am PST 
Be sure to check out the full line of delicious products so you can feel like a brand new baby.
